data.text:
Emilio Estevez is an actor, director and writer born in the United States. In the 1980s he launched his professional career as a member of the Brat Pack. The 1983 film The Outsiders, starring Estevez, was a critical and commercial success.

Young Guns, Maximum, The Mighty Ducks, Repo Man, Bobby, Stakeout and Young Guns are not the only films in which Estevez has appeared.

What is Emilio Estevez’s net worth? Salary, Earnings

The estimated value of Emilio Estevez net worth in 2021 is approximately $20 million. As a prominent actor, screenwriter and director of films and television shows, he makes a living.

He has earned a respectable living performing as a vocalist in films starring Arthur and the Invisibles. As a guest director, Emilio Estevez oversaw episodes of The Guardian, Cold Case and CSI: NY. Additionally, he has directed episodes of Criminal Minds. Estevez Sheen Productions is the name of his organization.

Where was Emilio Estevez born? Ethnicity, Nationality, Family, Education

Martin Sheen and Janet Templeton gave birth to Estevez in Staten Island, New York, on May 12, 1962. Her three siblings are Renee Estevez, Charlie Sheen and Ramon Estevez.

Emilio Estevez enrolled at Santa Monica High School in Malibu, California. Estevez co-wrote and starred in the school production of Echoes of an Era. Estevez decided to pursue acting after finishing high school because he could not enroll in college.

Is Emilio Estevez married? Relationship

After being married to model Carey Salley, Emilio Estevez is the father of two children: Taylor Levi Estevez and Paloma Rae Estevez. The relationship ended in 1986.

Paula Abdul married Estevez six years later. Reports indicate that Emilio Estevez and Demi Moore had a fleeting relationship.

How tall is Emilio Estevez? Weight, hair color

So as of 2021, what is Emilio Estevez’s age, height, and weight? Emilio Estevez, as of today, August 5, 2021, has turned 59 years old. He was born on May 12, 1962. Notwithstanding his 169 centimeters (5′ 5′′) height and 5′ 5′′ feet and inches, he weighs 158 pounds and 72 kilograms.

How did Emilio Estevez start his Professional Career?

Emilio debuted as an actor in the theater. He later appeared alongside his father in the Broadway performance of “Mister Roberts.” He appeared on an episode of Insight in 1980.

Two years later, Emilio Estevez appeared in the television movie In the Custody of Strangers. In addition to Nightbreaker, Late Last Night, and Dollar for the Dead, he has appeared in several television movies.

After taking on the acting and directing roles of Showtime’s Rated X TV movie, Emilio Estevez’s career began to flourish. During the 1980s, he was a member of the Brat Pack. Two years later, he appeared in the movie Tex.

Keith ‘Two-Bit’ Mathews was portrayed by Estevez in the 1983 film The Outsiders. His later films included Repo Man, Nightmares, St. Elmo’s Fire, The Breakfast Club and Young Guns.

He has played the lead role in LA Riot Spectacular, Judgment Night and D3: The Mighty Ducks. Emilio plays the moving figure in the John Parr-directed music video for St. Elmo’s Fire.

Director Estevez has contributed to the production of Rated X, The Way, Bobby and The War at Home, among others.

He has been nominated for a Golden Globe and received the Western Heritage Award for “Bronze Wrangler” in recognition of his commitment to his craft.

Five ALMA Award nominations and two Shorty Award nominations were submitted in support of Emilio Estevez. Estevez was honored at the Venice Film Festival with the Best Actor Award.

It received two nominations (2006), one from the Broadcast Film Association Awards and one from the Screen Actors Guild Awards.
